message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to acquire this item. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $10000 for it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we believe in providing exceptional value to our customers. Therefore, we are offering the product to you at a discounted price of $11500. This is our final offer before we consider other potential buyers.
